name: findit (Ahnaf30e)
description:
So, this is a weird game about this fish trying to find an exit. I dunno if it's really a fish tho. Dodge enemies, "spiks", and find your way out of this horrible (cool) maze.

There is a tutorial in the game.

WASD or Left mouse button to move.

Right click / L / Enter to dash.

R to restart.

Esc to go to the main menu.
